name: The Last Outpost (ulm-awesome)
description:
The Last Outpost

You are the watcher, the keeper of the last fire. Your task is quite simple. Survive the cold and keep the flame alive.

But the enemy forces are strong. Waves after waves of powerful forces are crushing against your last barricade. Don’t give in! You are our last hope to prevent the end of civilization and good.

Collect resources to keep the flame alive and build up your outpost. Repair any damage to your fortification.

Keep yourself warm enough to survive the freezing winds of the winter.

And for the sake of all - keep that fire alive. Or you won’t see the sunrise again.

Controls: Keyboard: Move: WASD or ←↑↓→ Action: Space or Enter Gamepad: Move: LStick Action: A
